doc:
Peter Boyle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Boyle 0 Peter Lawrence Boyle (October 18, 1935 – December 12, 2006) was an American actor. Known as a character actor, he played Frank Barone on the sitcom Everybody Loves Raymond and the comical monster in Mel Brooks' film spoof Young Frankenstein (1974). He also starred in The Candidate. Boyle, who won an Emmy Award in 1996 for a guest-starring role on the science-fiction drama The X-Files, won praise in both comedic and dramatic parts following his breakthrough performance in the 1970 film Joe. Peter_Lawrence_Boyle ( October_18_,_1935 – December_12_,_2006 ) was an_American_actor . Known as a_character_actor , he played Frank_Barone on the_sitcom_Everybody Loves Raymond and the_comical_monster in Mel_Brooks '_film_spoof_Young_Frankenstein_(_1974_) . He also starred in The_Candidate . Boyle , who won an_Emmy_Award in 1996 for a_guest-starring_role on the_science-fiction_drama The_X-Files , won praise in both comedic_and_dramatic_parts following his_breakthrough_performance in the_1970_film_Joe .
